snippet: Human rights proponents from different generations combine efforts to give closed societies a voice.
abstract: Movements.org and Advancing Human Rights, two small American human rights groups, are joining forces to support online activists in authoritarian countries; the merged organization will retain the name Advancing Human Rights.
lead_paragraph: Human rights proponents from different generations combine efforts to give closed societies a voice.

headline.seo: Groups to Aid Online Activists in Authoritarian Countries
headline.main: Groups to Help Online Activists in Authoritarian Countries
headline.print_headline: Groups to Help Online Activists in Authoritarian Countries
